# Search Sheets

# Description

Searches for everything inside a sheet based on a query.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Sheet - The ID of the sheet being searched. Click the icon to browse your Smartsheet files. This field supports String type input.
* Query - The text with which to perform the search. Use double-quotes for an exact search. This field supports String type input.









* Sheets - Automatically generated output variable.
